wikipedia_page.main:
Mark Daniel Bott is an English first-class cricketer.
He was born in Nottingham, England and is Jewish.

response: Despite his prior role as captain, Molins was not selected for Ireland at the 2007 World Cup, and never played at One Day International (ODI) level. In 2008, he was named along with Mark Bott and Darren Gerard to the Maccabi GB cricket team to represent the United Kingdom at the 2009 Maccabiah Games.
*(Born 1986) Mark Bott, county and international player, was born in Nottingham.
In 2008, he was named along with Mark Bott and Jason Molins to the Maccabi GB cricket team to represent the United Kingdom at the 2009 Maccabiah Games.

Canadian Olympian Josh Binstock and his partner won the gold medal in men's beach volleyball."Walkover gold for Nusbaum, Binstock at Maccabi Games", YorkRegion.com. Canadian Pan American Games medalist Sasha Gollish won gold medals running in the 800m, 1,500m, and 5,000m events."Canada wraps up Maccabiah games with 50 medals," Canadian Jewish News.  Cricketer Zac Elkin won a gold medal with Team South Africa, and cricketer Mark Bott won a silver medal with Great Britain."Maccabiah cricket silver a 'tremendous achievement,'" The Jewish Chronicle. Josh Kennet won a silver medal with Great Britain in soccer.
